FxtDocumentDescription.p: Export the discourse chart to a basic XLingPaper document which can then be used to cut and paste into another XLingPaper document. XLingPaper is a way to write linguistic papers using XML technologies.
Some of us like using the freely available XMLmind XML Editor with the XLingPaper configuration files for XMLmind to do this editing. See https://software.sil.org/xlingpaper/
